values: This is where it all begins Where our first breath and the hot sharp feeling if LIFE starts. This is being cruel, the world. This is where there's no reason And no explanation No justification Don't ask, don't anticipate, don't expect. This is when the sky turns limeade sherbert. This is where the questions stop and our own answers begin. Self definition mandatory. Lack of judgement requested. Kind consideration appreciated. ::comment to be added, mostly private::
